items.name: X-Plosive Runs
items.description: Increases sprint speed by 15% for two minutes.

items.name: Muscleman Milk
items.description: Increases damage dealt by 15% for two minutes.

items.name: Iron 4 Skin
items.description: Reduces incoming damage taken by 15% for two minutes.

items.name: Stamina Boost Shot
items.description: Improves stamina regeneration for two minutes.

items.name: Orange Juice
items.description: Combines the effects of X-plosive Runs, Muscleman Milk and Iron 4 Skin, lasting two minutes.
